CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_kdbm_pbfl_login_fails ( login_attempt_id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id bigint(20), login_attempt_date datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', login_attempt_ip varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (login_attempt_ID) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
